title: Update Ref Guide to recommend against using the ExtractingRequestHandler in production
description:
Shawn Heisey recently updated the wiki to include the hard-learned guidance that the ExtractingRequestHandler should not be used in production. Cassandra Targett recommended updating the reference guide instead. Let’s update the ref guide.

comments.content:
I went to the Ref Guide page to add a short warning about performance implications, but realized that the page hadn't been really looked at or revised since the first release of the Ref Guide in 2009. I decided to re-organize the sections quite a bit and edited a good bit of the content with the perspective of a new user in mind.

The warning referenced in this issue is added as a new section.

I also edited the old wiki page for this (https://wiki.apache.org/solr/ExtractingRequestHandler) to remove the now outdated and duplicated content.
